answers.answer: Sounds like you were having contractionsz...im not sayin for sure but pain in tha lower belly to your back thatsz on && off isz what I felt with my first pregnancy then I started timing them && turnsz out they were contractionsz && I wasz in labor...hope it turnsz out okay....

Unfortunately if you have preeclampsia there isn't anything they can do besides deliver the baby. I had to be induced at 37 weeks with my first and it wasn't bad..just try to relax and drink lots of water and hope for the best :-) good luck!
Well I'm admitted in the hospital they're running tests I'm hungry ready to go home
Keep us updated hope everything is okay !
Tests came back normal I'm on strict bed rest and going to the doctor Monday to schedule an induction date kinda scared but if others can do it so can I just gotta be strong for me and my baby

question: I'm an ftm 37 wks and 5 days and I went to the doctor Monday and he checked for dilation I'm dilated don't know how far but my blood pressure was high they checked it 4times last time it was still a little high so he told me to get some rest and come back today,Wednesday, well yesterday I had a scare I was cramping really bad that went from my lower stomach to my back it kept going and coming but eventually stopped well I did a little research about preeclampsia and I'm scared I don't want to be induced what can I do if there's anything
title: preeclampsia
